alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; Deer Valley; North Phoenix, Glendale; Northwest Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 15 at 8:59AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 930 AM MST... At 859 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tolleson, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Glendale, Peoria, Surprise, Avondale, Goodyear, El Mirage, Tolleson, Youngtown, Sun City, Waddell, Laveen, Cashion, Sun City West, Litchfield Park, Glendale Sports Complex, Luke AFB, Phoenix International Raceway, Downtown Peoria and Surprise Stadium. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 123 and 141. US Highway 60 between mile markers 143 and 156. AZ Route 101 between mile markers 2 and 17. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Buckeye, Avondale; Deer Valley; North Phoenix, Glendale; Northwest Valley
